docsEventObject.description: The Docs event object is the portion of the overall event object that carries information about a user's Google Docs document. It's only present in an event object if the host application is Google Docs.

id.description: The ID of the document open in the Docs UI

title.description: The title of the document open in the Docs UI

matchedUrl.description: Object that contains the URL that matches the pattern set in the link preview trigger.

url.description: URL that matches the pattern set in the link preview trigger.

addonHasFileScopePermission.description: Whether or not the add-on has drive.file scope permission for this document.
